Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Brandi
Reviews.Content: Still learning everything I need to know about this camera but so far I love it! Just need some more practice!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging - Body (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens
Includes: Transcend 16GB Memory Card, Cleaning Kit, Tripod
HDMI Cable, DVD, Carry Case, Cleaning Cloth and Spare LP-E8 Battery
$50 Value Nations Photo Lab Gift Card
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
